subject: Swimming
Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Rebecca Soni became the first woman ever to break the 2:20 barrier with a clocking of 2 minutes 19.59 seconds, successfully defending her gold medal in the event from the Beijing Games.
snippet: Rebecca Soni became the first woman ever to break the 2:20 barrier with a clocking of 2 minutes 19.59 seconds, successfully defending her gold medal in the event from the Beijing Games.
